    \clearpage

    \addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Lembar Pengesahan Program Studi Teknik Informatika}
    \include{chapters/Pengesahan_Program_Studi}
    
    \addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Lembar Pengesahan}
    \include{chapters/Lembar_Pengesahan}

    \include{chapters/Abstraksi}
    
    \addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Kata Pengantar}
    \include{chapters/Kata_Pengantar}
    
    \renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1}
    \addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Daftar Isi}
    \tableofcontents
    \updatechaptername
    \newpage
    
    \addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Daftar Gambar}
    \listoffigures
    \newpage
    
    \addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Daftar Tabel}
    \listoftables
    
    \newpage
    
    % Urusan Halaman
    \renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{1.5}
    \pagestyle{fancy}
    \fancyhead{}
    \fancyfoot{}
    \fancyhead[RH]{\thepage}
    \renewcommand{\thepage}{\thechapter-\arabic{page}}

    % BAB DIMASUKKAN DI SINI
    \setcounter{page}{1}
    \include{chapters/Pendahuluan}
    \setcounter{page}{1}

    \setcounter{page}{1}
    \include{chapters/Bab-3}
    \setcounter{page}{1}
    \include{chapters/Penutup}
    
    % DAFTAR PUSTAKA IEEE
    \pagenumbering{roman}
    \setcounter{page}{9}
    \addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Referensi}
    \bibliography{references/refs}
    \newpage
    
    % LAMPIRAN DIMASUKKAN DI SINI
    \titleformat{\chapter}[block]
    {\bfseries}
    {\chaptertitlename \ \thechapter.}
    {5pt}
    {\vspace{0pt}}
    
    \renewcommand{\thepage}{\thechapter-\arabic{page}}
    
    \appendix % Sertakan untuk memulai bagian baru
    \updatechaptername
    \makeatletter
    \addtocontents{toc}{\protect\renewcommand*{\cftchapnumwidth}{5.5em}}
    \makeatother
    \setcounter{page}{1}
    \include{appendices/tor}

    \setcounter{page}{1}
    \include{appendices/logbook}
